Messages.Author: Florian Waldner
Messages.Content: Dear Students,  Please find the instructions for tomorrow's Innovation Marketing exam below. Additionally, the Zoom link, detailed instructions, and a short practice exam to help you familiarize yourself with the interface are available on ISIS.  Best regards, Florian   Before the exam - Try out the test exam to see which question types will be used and if it works fine on your setup - Make sure to have an operating camera and the latest version of the Zoom client - Make sure to use your laptop with a charger - Join the Zoom call https://us06web.zoom.us/j/85612812759?pwd=w5QTrR1mpFljLs76PJPsIQcDMJuEYd.1  (from 15:45 p.m.) - Upload the „confirmation of exam requirements“ form on ISIS before 16:00.      Without the confirmation form, you cannot access the exam!  During the exam - You can start the exam at 16:00, from that on you have 60min to finish the exam - Stay in the main room of the Zoom call - The exam is auto-saved with every page change and after every minute. You can also manually save longer texts. In the event of interruptions (e.g. Internet failure, accidental closing of the browser window), you can continue at the point of the last storage - If you have questions/problems raise your hand in Zoom and we will move you to a breakout room - in case of technical problems take screenshots as evidence  After the exam - Do not de-register from this ISIS course. If you do, we can’t evaluate your exam  Attempts at deception include, but are not limited to: - Working together on the exam - Conducting the exam with outside help - Persons other than the registered student conduct the exam

Messages.Author: Thomas Kohler
Messages.Content: Hello together, We had some technical difficulties, but now the submission of the Market Research Report via ISIS is open. Please resubmit by Friday, June 14, since keeping track of the email submissions is difficult. Best, Thomas

Discussions.Discussion_Name: Exemplary submission for the Market Research Assignment

Messages.Author: Florian Waldner
Messages.Content: Dear Students,  Attached, you will find an exemplary submission for the Market Research Assignment. Please note that this submission is from a previous semester when market sizing was not included.  For your assignment, I am eager to see how you can apply the methods we have discussed in the context of an entrepreneurial situation. Your insights should be presented in a format of 5-10 slides.  Best regards, Florian

Messages.Author: Thomas Kohler
Messages.Content: Everyone should join today's InnoDays Kickoff starting at 16:15. Same link as always: https://us06web.zoom.us/j/87278282797?pwd=06b5C87Tk2iOWD3aXIhxnFVuSHu2I7.1

Messages.Author: Thomas Kohler
Messages.Content: Hello everyone, We will use the same Zoom link also today. See you soon, Thomas

Messages.Author: Florian Waldner
Messages.Content: Hello class, Today we will meet online via same old Zoom link. Florian

Messages.Author: Mona Frermann
Messages.Content: Dear students, those who preregistered but forgot to register via Moses can now do so until tomorrow (May 14) at 11:59 PM. Kind regards, Mona

Messages.Author: Thomas Kohler
Messages.Content: Hello class, Welcome to our Innovation Marketing course! We’ll discuss the most relevant concepts and apply methods for how to market innovation. Our first session is on 26.04.2024, 16.00-19.00 online via this Zoom link. Please review the syllabus before class. Looking forward to seeing you online tomorrow!

Messages.Author: Mona Frermann
Messages.Content: Dear students, thank you for your interest in this course. All preregistered students can participate in the first session. We may have to adjust the number of participants afterwards. Kind regards Mona

Messages.Author: Kathrin Forchhammer
Messages.Content: Dear students,  you can pre-register for the course until April 21. Since the course is limited to 60 participants, only those who pre-register can be taken into account. In order to pre-register, please fill out the "preselection questionnaire". You can find it on the ISIS page of this course.

Discussions.Discussion_Name: Searching for Three Members for Innodays

Messages.Author: Syed Ali Murad Tahir
Messages.Content: Hello Everyone, I am looking for three more people to join my team for the "clearlea.se" challenge during innovation days. A little bit about me: I am currently a master's student specializing in Machine Learning and Data Science. I have experience working with Natural Language Processing and Large Language Models, and I am currently working as a Data Engineer. I am seeking three members to join me for the "Clearlea.se" challenge. However, I am also open to collaborating on other projects if you have any ideas. If you're interested, feel free to message me! Please include a little bit yourself when you do. Best regards

Messages.Author: Paul Oscar Scheuermann
Messages.Content: Hello,  I was wondering if we could get the slides from the lecture any time soon.   Thank you very much in advance for your answer.  Regards, Paul

Discussions.Discussion_Name: Clarification on Individual Assignments 1 & 2 and InnoDays Project

Messages.Author: Syed Ali Murad Tahir
Messages.Content: Hello, I would like to clarify a few points regarding Individual Assignments 1 and 2: For the market research report, we have the following options, correct? Our own new startup idea Current startups available in the market A startup provided by you in today’s (Friday - 24.05.2024) class Will the startup idea for the InnoDays project be the same as the one we work on for Assignments 1 and 2? Alternatively, can we choose a different idea for Assignments 1 and 2, with the possibility that the best ideas will be selected for the InnoDays project, or will we be required to work on a startup idea provided by you? Thank you for your time and assistance. Best regards
